patthana4.3:1.1: Kusalaṁ sappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ sappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ sappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo sappaccayo ca abyākato sappaccayo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana4.3:2.1: Akusalaṁ sappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.3:3.1: Abyākataṁ sappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.3:4.1: Kusalaṁ sappaccayañca abyākataṁ sappaccayañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.3:5.1: Akusalaṁ sappaccayañca abyākataṁ sappaccayañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.3:6.1: Kusalaṁ sappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana4.3:7.1: Akusalaṁ sappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana4.3:8.1: Abyākataṁ sappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.3:9.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.3:10.1: Akusalaṁ sappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana4.3:11.1: Abyākataṁ sappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.3:12.1: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre …pe… namagge ekaṁ …pe… navippayutte tīṇi …pe… novigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.3:16.1: Kusalo sappaccayo dhammo kusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.3:17.1: Akusalo sappaccayo dhammo akusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.3:18.1: Abyākato sappaccayo dhammo abyākatassa sappaccayassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.3:19.1: Kusalo sappaccayo dhammo kusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.3:20.1: Akusalo sappaccayo dhammo akusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.3:21.1: Abyākato sappaccayo dhammo abyākatassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.3:22.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta …pe… sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre …pe… magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
